directions: Mix spinach, carrots, croutons, green onions, black olives, feta cheese, black beans, and pine nuts together in a large bowl.
Whisk olive oil, vinegar, lemon juice, salt, and pepper together in a small bowl. Drizzle over spinach mixture; stir to coat.
ingredients: 1/4 cup crumbled feta cheese, or more to taste
1/4 cup drained and rinsed black beans, or more to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
title: Delicious Spinach Salad
